Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 130th/Ellis
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains running with significant delays following an earlier obstruction near UIC-Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains running with significant delays following an earlier obstruction near UIC-Halsted.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
